songs.title: I Need Mines
songs.lyrics:
Run dirty on my city
In a major scraper
Hoe you can keep that pussy
Bitch I’m chasing paper
I’m hitting laps
I’m checking traps
You owe me money nigga
So what’s up with that
Shouldn’ta done that shit
You better run that shit
Before I have my niggas
Come and gun you in that bitch
They’ll kill your lady
Hit the crib
Kidnap your baby
Maybe you can think I’m bluffing
Your ? is nothing
Ain’t no discussion
Nigga fuck you pay me
Every single dollar
NO extra tips
Every cent is mine
NO pressure
No everything is fine
And I’m gonna bless ya
Every single time

But if you try to get scandalous
That’s when I’m gonna get mannish
And come through with them cannons
Kiling everything from yiur mama to your granny
HIt up everybody in yoiur motherfucking family
Never need a gun
Cause I keep one handy
How you live kids eating
Bullets like it’s candy
A boss  by a moss like the nigga named Randy

Randy randy
Hey you little kids
Eating bullets like it’s candy
A boss  by a moss like the nigga named Randy

Niggas tried to stop me
But them suckas fell
By the wayside
I’m all out
In Cali mode
They got holes out
On blaze flying
I got a shorty down in Tucson
My supply to get two sums
The first of many
I’m second to none
My nickname should be two guns
I’ll bust back
I’ll bust first
My feather’s wild
I’ll bust thick
They locked me up
I came right  back
To the same hood
With the same crap
Same niggas
With the same traps
Like nothing happened
Still making a killing
Most people don’t like kill
Cause I remember
Trapping down the projects
Buildings


I need mines
I need mines
I need mines
I need all of mines

I need mines
I need mines
I need mines
I need all of mines
Not 80 or 90%
I need every dollar
I need every cent

Not 80 or 90%
I need every dollar
I need every cent

I’m gonna need all the money
I’m gonna need all the money
I’m gonna need all the bread
And that SRT gonna
Make them niggas call the Feds
Who got it bout to get the check
Niggas begging for a pass
Fuck em feed em hydroshocks
And leave em bleeding in the grass
Product of old  fowler plays
Write their F16’s a cast
Taking what I want
What you want boss
It ain’t no need to ask
I’m a different breed
Me and my niggas
Seem like we the last
Bring em in
And bus em down
And half of y’all
Ain’t seen the slab
Half of y’all just talk tough
Other half ain’t saying shit
This ain’t no junk
Go get that money
Fuck a butt nigga
I’m playing to win
Musta thought I was playing
Shit
Ain’t no junk
Go get that money
And fuck a butt nigga
I’m playing to quit
Musta thought I was playing
Shit
They ain’t know
Not a nigga do
We was at you niggas
Now we at you niggas
They know they name

I need mines
I need mines
I need mines
I need all of mines

I need mines
I need mines
I need mines
I need all of mines

Not 80 or 90%
I need every dollar
I need every cent

Not 80 or 90%
I need every dollar
I need every cent

I need mine
I”m on every block and corner
Like the street signs
And all you feeling me
And it’s only
Been three lines
Rep my city hard
And I don’t need no tat
It’s in my veins
I bleed mines
Balling up trying to
Resign
They want me to
Resign
I  must decline
I’m just happy with some
Recline
And I
Define
Getting it
Big bucks
No wacks
I been chasing paper
Hope I don’t blow by my hand
And she say money make her come
Well hoe it make me come too
If you think we bout to fuck
Nig bring somewhere
You come through
We could chop it  up
Kung fu
If it’s by the dollar or the product
Dont bring half I want the whole
It’s a lotta what it do
OOH!

I need mines
